amqp_tool.py script¶

Script which simplifies debugging and testing AMQP communication, routing, keys and so on.

edeposit.amqp.amqp_tool.createBlockingConnection()[source]¶

Return properly created blocking connection.

Uses edeposit.amqp.amqpdaemon.getConParams().

edeposit.amqp.amqp_tool.createSchema()[source]¶

Create the routing schema in rabbitmq’s database.

Note

This is here mainly for testing purposes. Proper schema will require more routing keys.

edeposit.amqp.amqp_tool.receive(queue)[source]¶

Print all messages from edeposit.amqp.settings RABBITMQ_ALEPH_OUTPUT_QUEUE.
